sources.title: Secret Service Investigator
sources.description: Title: Secret Service Investigator Summary: Directed by: R.G. Springsteen Actors: Lloyd Bridges, Milton Parsons Production Company: Republic Pictures (I) Release Date: 31 May 1948 (USA) Aspect Ratio: 1.37 : 1 Add Full Plot

metadata.Plot: Steve Mallory (Lloyd Bridges), a returning war hero, has an uncanny resemblance to Dan Redfern (Lloyd Bridges), and a Secret Service agent has him impersonate Redfern, who unknown to the counterfeiting gang has been killed, infiltrate the forgers, find out the name of the leader and put an end to their activities from within.
metadata.Actors: Lynne Roberts, Lloyd Bridges, George Zucco
